author: slimjamesc
content: Anyone know if there was a tool for claiming ICO ETH using a private Bitcoin donation key?  I lost the ETH claim receipt..  There must be some way of verifying those claim receipts so I imagine there may be something like this.  Or if you know anyone that could help.  I donated a bitcoin back in the day..  Thank you..

author: pietjepuk
content:
From looking at [0] and [1] , you really seem to need to have access to the seed to generate that receipt. Your private Bitcoin key doesn't come into play, as it was just a regular transaction (to an address associated with the random seed). 

[0] https://www.reddit.com/r/ethereum/comments/2bilqg/note_there_is_a_paranoid_highsecurity_way_to/ [1] https://github.com/ethereum/pyethsaletool/blob/master/pyethsaletool.py#L124-L135 and
